page.title: 17Recreational pursuits
page.content: An informal survey by the children of the Coates County Primary School showed that the recreational pursuits of the area tended to be of a sporting nature: {Football Cricket Snooker { Ice skating Darts Ice hockey { Karate Judo Swimming { BMX biking Grass track stock cars { Running Fishing Caravaning { Cycling and cycle racing and trials { Home computers Home videos { Watching T.V. Break dancing { Caged bird fancying { Clay pigeon shooting { Shooting (hunting) { Gardening (especially veg. growing) { Sewing and knitting These are the most commonly named pursuits.Fishing was the single most popular pursuit.
